channel.title: Certain range items to work? Also how to make a npc hit lower or not hit?
channel.description: Okay on my server Rock crabs hit WAY to high. I need to fix that to mabey make them hit 2 at the highest. Also when i use the mage bow you have to get right next to the npc to use that bow. How do i fix that? Crystal bow your arms don't even move arrows come out but there not green either. It'd be cool if you can help thanks (:

Okay on my server Rock crabs hit WAY to high.

Also when i use the mage bow you have to get right next to the npc to use that bow. How do i fix that?
